item.title: es8.1.3 本地搭建伪集群
item.author: uniqueacheng@gmail.com (Jason Tan)
item.description: 环境说明 macOS Monterey 12.3.1 架构 M1 Pro 软件准备 elasticsearch，下载对应架构软件 elasticsearch-8.1.3-darwin-aarch64.tar.gz kibana，下载对应架构软件 kibana-8.1.3-darwin-aarch64.tar.gz 目录规划 ../ ./elastic-stack ​ ｜—-
item.dc:creator: Jason Tan

item.title: Curl操作Elasticsearch
item.author: uniqueacheng@gmail.com (Jason Tan)
item.description: 1 2 ➜ ~ curl -X GET http://localhost:9200 curl: (52) Empty reply from server 返回这样的结果，有安全策略或版本大于7时默认开启，需要改用https协议 1 2 3 ➜ ~ curl -X GET "https://localhost:9200" curl: (60) SSL certificate problem: self signed certificate in certificate chain
item.dc:creator: Jason Tan
